availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: August Gunter (Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and bookseller)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant bookseller. Germany native. Married to Eliza Lumley Gunter in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 18, 1847. Father of Alice Gunter, John Gunter, Fanny Gunter, Milly Gunter, and Harry Gunter. Merchant in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Bookseller in Jefferson County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Bookseller in Jefferson County in 1865.
